Articles.Content:
Hiya

I just updated to .25 and I'm having trouble with my mods.

Astronomer's visual pack (with city lights)

DSL Pandora

Cleverbobcat

Lionhead Probe pack

KWRocketry

Mechjeb

Hotrockets

Simple Part Organizer

TersierSpaceTech

HullCamera

FerramAerospaceResearch

With ALL of those in the Gamedata folder it crashes before the main menu.

If I remove EITHER KWRocketry or Astronomer visual pack it works fine.

All of these worked in .24, and I made sure to get all updates for .25 that were available. (including the KWrocketry that came out yesterday)

specs: 6core AMD, 8GB ram, EAH6850. Win7x64

Running 32bit KSP.

Any help would be appreciated.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005-0-25-Release-3-7-Oct-13-2014-Active-Texture-Management-Save-RAM%21?highlight=texture+management

Get that mod and make sure you keep it up to date. You're probably running out of memory. If KSP's footprint (if you go to windows task manager you can see it) is over 3gb you'll need Active Texture Management.

I just watched my task manager and KSP hit 3.5G when it crashed. Without the visual pack it only hit 2.5g. Wow.

Testing that mod right now.

Which one do I get? x86 or x64?

Edit: x86 worked like a charm. only hit 2.5g. Thank you!!!

Edited October 14, 2014 by Buschwick
woulda said the one that matches the ksp build you have (x86). Yep. Active texture management chops the memory usage of KSP about in half (maybe 1/3). Now you can put a lot more mods in.
